title: 87/30/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 December 1986 approving an amendment to the specific programme relating to poultrymeat in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 December 1986
approving an amendment to the specific programme relating to poultrymeat in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(87/30/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the programme relating to poultrymeat forwarded by the Netherlands Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 9 January 1986 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 3. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 5, 9. 1. 1982, p. 16.
